anya-e0608n:35: Paramaṃ maṅgalaṃ laddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.13.
anya-e0608n:41: Gihī sahāyako sāmī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.16.
anya-e0608n:52: Mahāvattā pavattā ca, atthassa ninnetā pabhū;
anya-e0608n:53: Amatassa dātā viññū, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.22.
anya-e0608n:54: Divā tapati ādicco, rattiṃ dippati candimā;
anya-e0608n:55: Rattiṃdivaṃ tapi nātho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.23.
anya-e0608n:56: Sannaddho khattiyo tapati, jhāyī tapati brāhmaṇo;
anya-e0608n:57: Nirantaraṃ tapi nātho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.24.
anya-e0608n:85: Natthi etādiso guru, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.38.
anya-e0608n:173: Ādicco viya dīpesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.82.
anya-e0608n:181: Dukkhato bahū mocesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.86.
anya-e0608n:195: Mānaṃ māyañca maddesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.93.
anya-e0608n:215: Sabbassa cāgī virāgī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.103.
anya-e0608n:257: Jino ajini pāpimaṃ, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.124.
anya-e0608n:291: Sabbesaṃ sabbaṃ bodhesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.141.
anya-e0608n:315: Bahuṃ iddhiṃ anuppatto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.153.
anya-e0608n:325: Paramaṃ sukhaṃ sampatto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.158.
anya-e0608n:333: Vedagū ca vedantagū, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.162.
anya-e0608n:349: Santataṃ samaṇo sāmī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.170.
anya-e0608n:430: Nirāgo cāpi nikkopo, nicchuddho cāpi nimmado;
anya-e0608n:431: Niddukkho cāpi nissoko, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.211.
anya-e0608n:455: Niccapalo ca nillolo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.223.
anya-e0608n:677: Dhāresi antimaṃ dehaṃ, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.334.
anya-e0608n:681: Sabbathā mutto subhaddo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.336.
anya-e0608n:735: Sabbattha saṃvuto sāmī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.363.
anya-e0608n:781: Patto sabbaññutaṃ ñāṇaṃ, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.386.
anya-e0608n:783: Paramaṃ sukhaṃ sampatto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.387.
anya-e0608n:811: Sududdasaṃ sivaṃ laddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.401.
anya-e0608n:823: Paramaṃ avayaṃ laddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.407.
anya-e0608n:849: Pūjanaṃ thomanaṃ laddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.420.
anya-e0608n:862: Sukhassa kovido cāpi, dukkhassa cāpi kovido;
anya-e0608n:873: Sabbaso bhavaṃ bhañjesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.432.
anya-e0608n:885: Loke ālokaṃ jotesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.438.
anya-e0608n:921: Sabbathā akkhayaṃ patto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.456.
anya-e0608n:931: Sabbadhi sumano santo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.461.
anya-e0608n:934: Tīrassa kovido cāpi, pārassa cāpi kovido;
anya-e0608n:935: Ghoraṃ oghaṃ pāraṅgato, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.463.
anya-e0608n:937: Sabbathā sabbaṃ bodhesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.464.
anya-e0608n:938: Yogassa kovido cāpi, khemassa cāpi kovido;
anya-e0608n:999: Paraṃ sukhaṃ adhippatto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.495.
anya-e0608n:1138: Ākāso viya paññāya, alitto anilo yathā;
anya-e0608n:1139: Anissito vihāsi yo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.565.
anya-e0608n:1145: Assāsesi yathā cando, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.568.
anya-e0608n:1147: Abhīruko yo acchambhī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.569.
anya-e0608n:1174: Asaṅgacitto akleso, āsā yassa na vijjati;
anya-e0608n:1179: Anupādā vimutto yo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.585.
anya-e0608n:1183: Appaneho ca appiho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.587.
anya-e0608n:1207: Akukkucco ca akaṅkhī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.599.
anya-e0608n:1256: Dhammiṭṭho cāpi dhammaṭṭho, paññiṭṭho cāpi paññaṭṭho;
anya-e0608n:1257: Suddhiṭṭho cāpi suddhaṭṭho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.624.
anya-e0608n:1277: Asamo yo asadiso, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.634.
anya-e0608n:1341: Sabbattha vimalo suddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.666.
anya-e0608n:1347: Sabbapāpaṃ pahāsi yo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.669.
anya-e0608n:1361: Sabbato bhaddaṃ dassāvī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.676.
anya-e0608n:1363: Sabbesu ca nirākaṅkho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.677.
anya-e0608n:1365: Nillobho api nillolo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.678.
anya-e0608n:1367: Nippapañco ca nicchalo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.679.
anya-e0608n:1375: Sabbataṇhā pahāsi yo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.683.
anya-e0608n:1417: Paññakkho cāpi medhakkho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.704.
anya-e0608n:1435: Dhammiṃ dhammaṃ vitthāresi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.713.
anya-e0608n:1449: Dassesi amataṃ dhammaṃ, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.720.
anya-e0608n:1557: Sabbaṃ sammā abhaññāsi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.774.
anya-e0608n:1587: Sabbattha saṃvuto sūro, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.789.
anya-e0608n:1605: Subhago sabbathā suddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.798.
anya-e0608n:1627: Yo amatapphalaṃ patto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.809.
anya-e0608n:1629: Paramaṃ sivaṃ sampatto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.810.
anya-e0608n:1631: Puṇṇindu viya sampuṇṇo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.811.
anya-e0608n:1643: Nibbānaṃ yo sacchikato, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.817.
anya-e0608n:1645: Sabbattha samako sāmī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.818.
anya-e0608n:1655: Sabbāsave pahāsi yo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.823.
anya-e0608n:1662: Yo na limpati kāmesu, āraggeriva sāsapo;
anya-e0608n:1669: Pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ yo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.830.
anya-e0608n:1671: Bahū satte pamocesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.831.
anya-e0608n:1681: Brāhmaṇo samaṇo sādhu, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.836.
anya-e0608n:1688: Yassa māyā ca māno ca, moho makkho ca pātito;
anya-e0608n:1691: Asatto sugato nātho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.841.
anya-e0608n:1696: Tapassī cāpi tejassī, yasassī ca yasodharo;
anya-e0608n:1697: Vipassī cāpi vidassī, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.844.
anya-e0608n:1699: Mahāmuni mahesī ca, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.845.
anya-e0608n:1727: Paramaṃ padaṃ sampatto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.859.
anya-e0608n:1741: Asatto sugato suddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.866.
anya-e0608n:1752: Tejassī ca tejadhano, tapassī ca tapodhano;
anya-e0608n:1753: Ñāṇesī ca ñāṇadhano, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.872.
anya-e0608n:1763: Sabbā kaṅkhā vinodesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.877.
anya-e0608n:1764: Sabbā kaṅkhāyo vāpesi, ātāpī jhāyī brāhmaṇo;
anya-e0608n:1765: Paccayānaṃ khayaṃ vidvā, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.878.
anya-e0608n:1789: Sabbavidhe yato yati, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.890.
anya-e0608n:1795: Accutaṃ akataṃ patto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.893.
anya-e0608n:1797: Buddho bodhiṃ pakāsesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.894.
anya-e0608n:1798: Paṇīto ca punīto ca, pavitto cāpi pāvano;
anya-e0608n:1799: Pesalo pavaro mejjho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.895.
anya-e0608n:1825: Bhavasotaṃ tiṇṇo nātho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.908.
anya-e0608n:1837: Janānaṃ nandako bhiyyo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.914.
anya-e0608n:1839: Kāmāsavaṃ pajahi yo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.915.
anya-e0608n:1849: Nirodhaṃ sakkhiṃ akāsi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.920.
anya-e0608n:1853: Sabbuttamaṃ dhammaṃ laddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.922.
anya-e0608n:1858: Sabbamohanisā hantvā, sabbaṃ rāgaṃ dosaṃ nudo;
anya-e0608n:1903: Sabbadhi sumutto santo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.947.
anya-e0608n:1921: Sabbe vattesi sabbaso, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.956.
anya-e0608n:1942: Sabbattha kusalo satthā, sabbattha kovido vidū;
anya-e0608n:1943: Sabbattha vimalo suddho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.967.
anya-e0608n:1969: Sabbaṃ sotthiṃ sacchikato, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.980.
anya-e0608n:1983: Sabbā icchā ucchedesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.987.
anya-e0608n:2093: Obhāsesi disā sabbā, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1042.
anya-e0608n:2209: Suddhaṃ saddhammaṃ dīpesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1100.
anya-e0608n:2213: Santataṃ santiṃ pasāresi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1102.
anya-e0608n:2228: Bahū bhavoghā tāresi, sudakkho nāviko yathā;
anya-e0608n:2243: Kalyāṇaṃ dhammaṃ desesi, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1117.
anya-e0608n:2291: Sumukho sundaro eso, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1141.
anya-e0608n:2339: Bhassaro bhāsuro bhiyyo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1165.
anya-e0608n:2353: Pasiddho vissuto pujjo, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1172.
anya-e0608n:2379: Sabbesaṃ seṭṭho dhammaṭṭho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1185.
anya-e0608n:2395: Yathābhūtaṃ vipassī ca, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1193.
anya-e0608n:2398: Sīlañca samādhiṃ patto, patto paññaṃ niyyānikaṃ;
anya-e0608n:2417: Dhuvaṃ sassataṃ sampatto, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1204.
anya-e0608n:2418: Buddhimā mutimā ceva, matimā ca matissaro;
anya-e0608n:2437: Nikkāmo nimmalo nātho, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1214.
anya-e0608n:2438: Moneyyaseṭṭho munindo, ratiṃ ca aratiṃ cuto;
anya-e0608n:2449: Uddharesi bahū satte, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1220.
anya-e0608n:2452: Dhañño nātho! Dhañño sāmī! Dhañño mārābhibhū munī!
anya-e0608n:2455: Aho! Aho! Pāraṅgato, buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1223.
anya-e0608n:2458: Aho! Buddho! Aho! Suddho! Aho! Saṃsuddhamānaso!
anya-e0608n:2459: Aho! Aho! Mettāsindhu! Buddhaṃ taṃ paṇamāmyahaṃ.1225.
